translations: n．流氓，恶棍：粗暴、残忍、无法无天的人。
· The ruffians attacked the innocent bystanders.
这些恶棍袭击了无辜的旁观者。

sentences.sentence: Javert asked the rest of the ruffians.
This was the moment when Eponine was following the ruffians to the boulevard.
sentences.translation: 爱潘妮这时正跟在那伙匪徒后面爬向大路。

sentences.sentence: She advanced a pace nearer the ruffians, she was terrible, she burst out laughing.
sentences.translation: 她向那伙匪徒跨上一步，气势好不吓人，她笑了出来。
